meanings.definition: A hot green or red pepper, used especially in Mexican cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added some jalapeno to my salsa for a spicy kick.
meanings.sent2: The jalapeno added a burst of flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The jalapeno jumped into the pot, ready to spice things up.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like jalapeno, leaving a fiery impression on everyone.
meanings.sent5: The jalapeno danced on my taste buds, leaving a sizzling sensation.
